featured.text: He remembered a kind of glue developed by a colleague that everyone thought 18 a failure because it did not stick very well.
His plan __________ in failure though it had been supported by many people.
Which of the following sayings best captures the spirit of Jeanie Low’s story? (A) Failure is the mother of success.

definition.zh_def: 失敗；未能達到預期的結果或目標。
definition.en_def: The lack of success in achieving a desired outcome or goal.
definition.example: His failure to complete the project on time cost the team the contract.
